title: Restrictions and barriers
description: Africa continent mostly face with the  challenge of barriers and restrictions on both from the financial institutions and individuals

f6_assessments.q0: Draft proposal. The problem statement is vague and the idea of the proposal is unclear. There is not enough information for impact assessment. I would recommend using the Catalyst documentation as a reference for a new proposal, more precisely the document proposal writing guide in the FAQ section on the IdeaScale Catalyst homepage.
f6_assessments.q1: Draft proposal. There is not enough information for feasibility assessment. I would recommend using the Catalyst documentation as a reference for a new proposal, more precisely the document proposal writing guide in the FAQ section on the IdeaScale Catalyst homepage.
f6_assessments.q2: Draft proposal. There is not enough information for auditability assessment. I would recommend using the Catalyst documentation as a reference for a new proposal, more precisely the document proposal writing guide in the FAQ section on the IdeaScale Catalyst homepage.

solution: As to help curb this situations on these barriers individual should be ale to posses the cardano token either p2p or easily swapping
experience:
Introduction of p2p as suggested will be a good strategy to get more people getting cardano token

Fees on swapping the token should be low
